data.text: N ma di, n ma wɔyɛnyi ragata i bɔɲɛ kui,
N ma sɛriyɛ suxu alako i xa simaya sɔtɔ,
N ma sɛriyɛ xiri i bɛlɛxɛsolee ra, a sɛbɛ i sondonyi ma.
Lɔnni xa findi i maaginɛ ra,
N ma sɛriyɛ i ratangama nɛ langoe ma,
Lɔxɔɛ nde, n nu na n ma banxi kui,
N naxa xaxilitare nde to,
A naxa kira suxu naxan dangima langoe ginɛ xa banxi dɛ ra.
Nunmare tɛmui nan nu a ra,
Ginɛ nde naxa sa a ralan,
Ginɛ murutaxi nan a ra,
A ɲɛrɛma taa kui xɛmɛ fenfe ra.
A naxa na xɛmɛ suxu,
«N laayidi tongo nɛ Ala bɛ,
N minixi i fende na nan ma.
Misira sade dugi maɲingixi na n sade ma,
a nun labundɛ xiri fanyi mɔɔli birin na.
Fa be, won xa yɛnɛ raba han gɛɛsɛgɛ,
barima n ma xɛmɛ mu na banxi,
A bara kɔbiri gbegbe xanin a xun ma,
A naxa nɔ na xɛmɛ ra a xa kɔɔta saabui ra,
Xɛmɛ naxa bira a fɔxɔ ra keren na,
Yakɔsi n ma die, wo wo tuli mati n na,
I bɔɲɛ naxa i madaxu i xa bira na ginɛ mɔɔli fɔxɔ ra,
barima a bara mixi gbegbe faxa,
A xa banxi findixi faxɛ kira nan na,
